entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 15 April 2023
